title: Facial Recognition System
description: Deep learning model for real-time facial recognition with high accuracy, capable of identifying individuals in various lighting conditions.

title: Sentiment Analysis Engine
description: Natural language processing model that analyzes customer reviews and social media posts to determine sentiment and emotional tone.

title: Predictive Maintenance System
description: Machine learning model that predicts equipment failures before they occur, using sensor data and maintenance history.

title: Recommendation Engine
description: Collaborative filtering algorithm that provides personalized content recommendations based on user behavior and preferences.

title: Autonomous Drone Navigation
description: Computer vision and reinforcement learning system that enables drones to navigate environments and avoid obstacles.

title: Medical Diagnosis Assistant
description: AI system that helps identify potential diseases from medical images like X-rays and MRIs with high accuracy.
